basics.name: Kevin Garzon Rodriguez
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full-Stack Developer with 6+ years of experience building scalable web applications and microservices. Specialized in React, Node.js, and AWS cloud architecture. Proven track record of leading teams, optimizing performance, and delivering high-quality solutions for retail, healthcare, and insurance industries.

work.summary: Analysis, design, development, and implementation of client requirements, focused on building scalable solutions and maintaining clean code. Applied SOLID principles, Clean Architecture, and Scrum methodology while implementing modern technologies and best practices using a microfrontend architecture and continuous deployments to develop an inventory management application.
achievements: Developed inventory management modules using clean code principles and microfrontend architecture, reducing development time by 20%
Implemented state management with Hooks and Context API for independent modules, optimizing codebase and reducing size by 30%
Established TypeScript best practices and modern technology adoption, enhancing project maintainability
Implemented CI/CD processes with code review practices, improving software quality and accelerating delivery cycles by 25%

key_projects.name: Inventory Management System
key_projects.description: Enterprise-level inventory tracking solution with real-time updates

work.summary: Led application development, requirements analysis, and continuous improvement across multiple client projects. Managed a team of 3 developers, conducted client sessions for requirements gathering, and implemented solutions using Scrum methodology, CI/CD with Jenkins, and AWS Lambda microservices architecture.
achievements: Developed and maintained critical microservices, achieving 50% reduction in reported errors
Led Center of Excellence team monitoring production applications, improving bug resolution efficiency by 40%
Implemented CloudWatch-based error management system, enhancing observability and reducing MTTR
Successfully migrated legacy applications to React, improving performance and user experience
Gained expertise in AWS ecosystem (Lambda, S3, CloudWatch, DynamoDB) through hands-on implementation
Improved client satisfaction through direct requirements gathering and solution alignment

key_projects.name: Healthcare Management Platform
key_projects.description: Multi-tenant SaaS platform for healthcare providers

work.summary: Developed internal workforce tracking application for schedule and service point management. Collaborated with various departments to ensure solutions aligned with business needs while applying development best practices.
achievements: Implemented performance metrics dashboard, improving data visualization and decision-making by 20%
Optimized backend services, reducing API response times by 10%
Enhanced UI/UX for activity logging, reducing user-reported issues by 10%
Delivered mobile application using React Native for field employees

key_projects.name: Workforce Management System
key_projects.description: Real-time tracking and scheduling for 200+ employees

languages.note: Currently improving through technical documentation and international collaboration
